# Gradient Color Stops

| Class                    | Support     |
| ------------------------ | ----------- |
| `from-inherit`           | 🌐 Web only |
| `from-current`           | 🌐 Web only |
| `from-transparent`       | 🌐 Web only |
| `from-black`             | 🌐 Web only |
| `from-white`             | 🌐 Web only |
| `from-{n}`               | 🌐 Web only |
| `from-[n]`               | 🌐 Web only |
| `via-inherit`            | 🌐 Web only |
| `via-current`            | 🌐 Web only |
| `via-transparent`        | 🌐 Web only |
| `via-black`              | 🌐 Web only |
| `via-white`              | 🌐 Web only |
| `via-{n}`                | 🌐 Web only |
| `via-[n]`                | 🌐 Web only |
| `to-inherit`             | 🌐 Web only |
| `to-current`             | 🌐 Web only |
| `to-transparent`         | 🌐 Web only |
| `to-black`               | 🌐 Web only |
| `to-white`               | 🌐 Web only |
| `to-{n}`                 | 🌐 Web only |
| `to-[n]`                 | 🌐 Web only |
